title: Diamond 3 Main Support looking for an( Diamond 4+) ADC Main!

embed.description: Summoner Lookup with statistics, ratings, LoLSkillScore and more for HappyEmpire, a League of Legends summoner on the Europe West region.

body:
Hello everybody!

I am currently looking for an Adc main to play with!

About me :

I am currently Diamond 4 and i main support since season 3.
I am 16 years old.
I finish School in about 3 weeks , after that i will be going to my work. On my free time i study and ofcourse play League of Legends. I've been playing League for about 3 years now. I am a fun and calm person.
I've played in different ranked Teams, and sometimes i even coach summoners, that want to improve their Supporter role.
My goal for this Season is Master Tier!

My main Support is{{champion:412}}  cause i like his kit, and his aggressive playstyle , but i also play champions such as{{champion:432}} {{champion:12}}  and some more.

I do have a teamspeak server where we can talk beside the game + ingame

What im expecting from you

I am looking for an dedicated Ad-Carry who can do his own calls, but knows what to do!
You have to be atlast Diamond 4-3
Who's willing to put in alot of time and work to have fun as well as climb up to the top of the ladder !
If you are interested in an experienced support and want to try me out Feel free to add me ingame!

My English is Ok, not fluent.
Languages: German and English

See you on the Rift{{summoner:31}} 

HappyEmpire
